Iam writing this to you for an issue my sister is facing and she is totally disturbed.

strictly.

with other family members and when we enquire she says that she is facing problem during namaz and cant
keep her wadu.

was valid or the wadu broken.

locally and he too adviced that this may be the act of satan to divert her attention and misguide her but still she is not convinced
and worried about Salah.

ANSWER
